name: Force10 | FTOS | Network | STP | STP Port State Changed (SNMP)
event_class__name: Network | STP | STP Port State Changed

patterns.value_re: ^PVST_TOPOLOGY_CHANGE: Topology change for instance: (?P<instance>\d+) BridgeAddr: \S+ Bridge port (?P<interface>.+) transitioned from \S+ to (?P<state__enum__stp_state>\S+) state\.$
